verbs.description: [ARG0: The French leader] [V: said] [ARG1: he has a strong relationship with Trump in part because they are both mavericks . But President Emmanuel Macron warned Trump against a trade war with Europe] .

The French leader said [ARG0: he] [V: has] [ARG1: a strong relationship with Trump] [ARGM-CAU: in part because they are both mavericks] . But President Emmanuel Macron warned Trump against a trade war with Europe .

The French leader said he has a strong relationship with Trump in part because [ARG1: they] [V: are] both [ARG2: mavericks] . But President Emmanuel Macron warned Trump against a trade war with Europe .

The French leader said he has a strong relationship with Trump in part because they are both mavericks . But [ARG0: President Emmanuel Macron] [V: warned] [ARG2: Trump] [ARG1: against a trade war with Europe] .
